title: Split Folio for Business Traveler
description: A business traveler needs to have their bill split, with the room and tax on one folio for their company and incidentals (e.g., room service) on another to be paid personally.

tasks.description: Retrieve the guest's reservation and confirm the request.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent understands the guest's need to split the bill.

tasks.description: Create a second folio (Folio B) for the guest's reservation.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new, separate folio is created in the PMS.

tasks.description: Transfer all incidental charges from the primary folio to the new folio.
tasks.expected_outcome: All non-room charges are successfully moved to Folio B.
